name: Francis_Drake
text:
Francis Drake
Francis Drake was an explorer who, in the 1570s, claimed land previously found by Spaniard Juan Rodriguez Cabrillo and claimed it for Elizabeth I, christening it Nova Albion.
Behind the scenes
Sir Francis Drake (c. 1540 – January 23, 1596) was an English explorer best known for his circumnavigational expedition from 1577 to 1580.
